doc:
Dick Sargent https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Sargent 0 Richard Stanford Cox (April 19, 1930 – July 8, 1994), known professionally as Dick Sargent, was an American actor, notable as the second actor to portray Darrin Stephens on ABC's fantasy situation comedy Bewitched. He took the name Dick Sargent from a Saturday Evening Post illustrator/artist of the same name. Richard_Stanford_Cox ( April_19_,_1930 – July_8_,_1994 ) , known professionally as Dick_Sargent , was an_American_actor , notable as the_second_actor to_portray Darrin_Stephens on ABC 's_fantasy_situation_comedy Bewitched . He took the_name_Dick_Sargent from a_Saturday_Evening_Post_illustrator/artist of the_same_name .
